## `SetBarChartOrientation`

Sets whether the bar charts should be drawn vertically or horizontally.

### Syntax {-}

``` {.lua}
SetBarChartOrientation(Orientation orientation)
```


### Parameters {-}

**Parameter** | **Description**
| :-- | :-- |
|[`Orientation`](#orientation) orientation | How the bars should be oriented. |
